# Support - TealTiger Python SDK

- **README**: [Python SDK Documentation](../README.md)

## ğŸ’¬ Getting Help

### GitHub Discussions (Recommended)
For questions, ideas, and community support:
- [Start a discussion](https://github.com/agentguard-ai/tealtiger/discussions)
- Note: Discussions are centralized in the main repository for easier community management

### GitHub Issues
For bug reports and feature requests:
- [Report a bug](https://github.com/agentguard-ai/tealtiger-python/issues/new?template=bug_report.md)
- [Request a feature](https://github.com/agentguard-ai/tealtiger-python/issues/new?template=feature_request.md)
- [Ask a question](https://github.com/agentguard-ai/tealtiger-python/issues/new?template=question.md)

### Security Issues
For security vulnerabilities:
- **DO NOT** create a public issue
- Use [GitHub Security Advisories](https://github.com/agentguard-ai/tealtiger-python/security/advisories/new)
- Or create an issue with `[SECURITY]` prefix (no sensitive details)

- **PyPI**: [tealtiger](https://pypi.org/project/tealtiger/)

For general inquiries, use GitHub Discussions or Issues.

## â±ï¸ Response Times

We aim to respond to:
- **Security issues**: Within 24 hours
- **Bug reports**: Within 2-3 business days
- **Feature requests**: Within 1 week
- **Questions**: Within 3-5 business days
